title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 325-3.9 - License fee for bureaus operated by institutions for profit
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 325-3.9 - License fee for bureaus operated by institutions for profit

State Regulations

All compensation medical bureaus when operated by summer
camps and other institutions, wherein such camps and institutions are operating
for a profit, shall be charged a license fee of $100 per annum for the
operation of such medical bureaus which are in operation for six months of the
year or less. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
§§
325-3.9

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
